cause.description:
i dont understand.. Now a days women want to go to collage to be successful and to go places.. but i think they forgot there place in life.. back in the 40's and 50's they would wait hand and foot on there "love".. and then all of a sudden things came up for "Womens Right"... il give them one right.. and thats the right to get into the kitchen and make me a sandwitch.
1. Women must make us a sandwitch
cause.mission: To put women back in there kitchens
cause.name: Women needs to go make me a sandwitch
